Package ml.alternet.security.auth.formats

Common built-in crypt formats and algorithms used to retrieve concrete hashers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CryptFormatter<T extends CryptParts>
    Bridge between the string representation of a crypt and its parts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColonCryptFormat
    With the Colon Crypt format, the parts are separated by ":".
    CryptParts
    Base class for crypt parts.
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat
    The scheme of this format appears in curly braces.
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.CryptFormatter
    Crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash.
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.CryptFormatterWrapper<T extends CryptParts>
    A wrapper around another formatter, for handling composed crypts such as {CRYPT}$1$gwvn5BO0$3dyk8j.UTcsNUPrLMsU6/0
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.IterativeSaltedFormatter  
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.SaltedCryptFormatter
    Salted crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash.
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.SchemePart
    Focus on the parts in curly braces.
    IterativeSaltedModularCryptFormatter
    password -> $5$rounds=80000$wnsT7Yr92oJoP28r$cKhJImk5mfuSKV9b3mumNzlbstFUplKtQXXMo4G6Ep5
    ModularCryptFormat
    The Modular Crypt Format is an ad-hoc standard used in popular linux-based systems.
    PlainTextCryptFormat
    A fallback format for passwords stored in plain text ; DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION.
    PlainTextCryptFormat.PlainTextHasher
    Just encode the chars with the charset supplied without hashing ; DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION.
    SaltedModularCryptFormatter  
    SaltedParts
    When a crypt use a salt.
    SaltlessModularCryptFormatter
    Used by the NT-HASH algorithm (Microsoft Windows NT and successors) that looks like a salted crypt, but without a salt field.
    UnixCryptFormat
    Legacy Unix Crypt Formats : A des-crypt hash string consists of 13 characters, drawn from [./0-9A-Za-z] :
    password -> JQMuyS6H.AGMo A fallback to MD5 32 hexa character hash :
    11fbe079ed3476f7712030d24042ca35
    WorkFactorSaltedParts
    When a crypt use a work factor.

Package ml.alternet.security.auth.formats Description

Common built-in crypt formats and algorithms used to retrieve concrete hashers.
